content.detailedDescription: My daughter from shallott, nc called and asked me to got outside to see if i might be able to view what she was seeing in nc. she told me to look toward the orion constellation which i did. when i looked at it through my binoculars i saw a very bright object that was flashing red and blue lights as an airplane or helicopter does. it did not move at all. i went into the house and came back out about 20 minutes later at which time it was gone.I have no idea what is was but i find it very strange that both myself in upstate ny and my daughter in nc could see the exact same thing at the same time.
content.summary: Bright star-like orb with flashing blue and red lights

content.detailedDescription: i seen something weird over in galatia on netty green rd and then seen it again over by johnson city by rural route motors kinda. i stopped on netty green and before i could get out the truck it shut the bright lights down. then i was on jc black top over by the place that makes windmills and i made it out the truck with the camera no sooner did my auto focus tune(and you could see lights plainly in screen) i went to hit the button and lights went out and it was small orange, green and red lights. still baffled by it. and no the was no jet or plane sounds.Today's date is 11/20/13 the other night i'd say the 18th i seen some strange lights in the sky and now tonight it is a topic of one of our local news paper on fb called disclosure newsmagazine monthly. i told no one of this except my gf that was on the phone with me at the time. now it is a multi person report
content.summary: Today's date is 11/20/13 the other night i'd say the 18th i seen some strange lights in the sky and now tonight it is a topic of one of our local news paper on fb called disclosure newsmagazine monthly. i told no one but my gf who was on phone
Apparent triangle shape with 6 or 7 exterior brown lights. floated/drop very close. helicopters present

content.detailedDescription: Triangle shaped ufo seen over hatfield pa at 10:58pm flying north west to south west. it was a perfect triangle shape. it had three white lights and one red pulsing red light. all the lights were very bright. one bright white light on each corner of the 'triangle' and one bright red blinking pulsing light in the center of the 'triangle'. the white lights did not blink and were steady. i was surprised how bright the lights were. the object seemed large and low altitude. since it was night time, this is all i could tell about the object. it looked triangular because of the position of the lights, but i am not sure if it was a different shape because it was dark outside. all i can go by are the lights. it was silent and moved rather slowly and it seemed to be quite low for an airplane. i never saw an airplane like that, but wouldn't rule it out. it was very bright and big and low altitude.
content.summary: Triangle ufo with very bright white lights and one bright pulsating red light in middle over hatfield pa

content.detailedDescription:
i was at work when my wife was pulling into the rail yard to come and get me. she mentioned at around 5:00pm that she was waiting outside in the truck but is scared because she believes she sees a ufo. 

   i leave work and get in the truck and we begin to pull away when i noticed the light as well. i had her pull over so we could look at it a bit longer. i wanted to make sure it wasn't an airplane or a star or planet visible. after only a few minutes- 2-3 tops= i noticed qty 2 helicopters s well as 2 jets flying towards where the light is. close by is a small airport, however there is never this much traffic converging in one location at any given time of the day. as the helicopters approach the light it slowly begins to fade and then rapidly disappears- (cloud cover was overhead) this thing did not become concealed by clouds. 

   the helicopters remained in the location for another 15-20 minutes circling the location where the light was. the jets made two paths through where the light was located and scrambled elsewhere.

  we continued on out of the railyard and followed route 32 on our way home- n the southwest horizon we see the light again- only orange in color. it was certainly moving as it seemed to keep the pace with our vehicle. at this point we tried to follow (take roads to get us closer) in come the jets flying towards the light again. moments later the light simply is gone. 

   the light was moving south west to north west- from vorheesville new york towards schenectady new york. low and behold there have been sightings of the same exact thing in saratoga county at around 5:20-5:30pm - shortly after the last light disappeared.
content.summary: Glowing hovering light- approached by two helicoptors and 2 jets then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: What we observed the three of us was three bright red lights appearing one at a time switching back and forth indirection for about set 7 to 9 minutes. at one point in the south sky the furthest one to the left turn very bright white. there were also aircraft within the area and you can tell the difference. i've never seen anything in my life like this and to be honest i almost wish i didn't see it. they look to be maybe 500 feet off the ground but it also was more than a mile away that the event look to be taking place was definitely still over michigan but way south of my location.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three lights appearing one at a time red in color one got very large and then bright then disappeared within nine minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was at my kitchen window and noticed a light in the southwestern sky. it was about the same elevation and path where helicopters often fly patients to and from local trauma hospital. i was looking for the chopper and it was then i noted the light was stationary. much too bright for star. i continued to watch for movement and none noted. i went outside with binoculars and all i could see was very bright light, no sound. did not seem to waver in position. i briefly saw a smaller and possibly 2 light objects below the larger light. i say perhaps as i convinced myself these were a reflection??When i first noticed the light it was about 6 pm, it is now 7 pm and the light is dimmer an lower in the trees. a helicopter just went by and those lights were as big and bright as the original brightness. i can no longer see the light. it is 7:11 pm
content.summary: Very bright object hovered for aprox 2hours,smaller lights lower than main light. initially i thought it was a helicopter light  as i see them often in that direction (nearby hospital transports patients). yet it cought my attention as it did not move.

content.detailedDescription: Observed an aircraft while photographing the sun rising.  an orb appeared for around six to ten seconds at exactly 11/20/2013 7:30.40.  the aircraft appeared to be chasing the object.  i cannot approximate the size.  easily the size of a large house yet spherical.
content.summary: Durham nc ufo : israel curiel

content.detailedDescription: It was clearly over the mo. river, and my 1st thought was "oh, hell no!" it was the shape of the stealth fighter...But much larger than even a stealth bomber,i thought at first it was someones kit plane by the way it weaved in and out of the low clouds so slowly(jets cant move that slow). it was clearly measuring or looking for something along the river..It had thin black, rod like tails at the ends of it , lit with red steady light. this thing was huge..And followed me up the river to my turn off..15ish miles, eliminating my thought of a kit plane. the air force base is an hour or so away so im guessing it was from there..Not a sound and riding the air so slowly..Its not right
content.summary: On the way to work, low hanging, overcast clouds. just turned north at waverly, and saw it drop out of the clouds like a glider

content.detailedDescription:
I not only have seen these objects i have spoken with them also, they are more stories than i can but on this page if someone would like to archive
these events now would be the chance.... there are so many i would have to 
be jogged back to memory on some of the older events.. but they are the truth they won't answer some questions but they will talk usually about current events
    my fist event flying object was quarter the size of the moon after three years of research i found it had a speed also of around 100,000 to above the speed of light, i first thought i was looking at a blue moon, till saw the moon in the west, when the object moved north at said speed, i became most interested, it stopped past the earths northern point, paused
came back to it's original position, for 30 seconds an left at plus the speed of light in the andromeda area, it left my field of view. my reaction was three years of research on an off to try figuring what i observed. i later found out that was a small ship do you understand, we are wasting trillions of dollars going into space, if they knew what i do they would understand it's futile and very dangerous, and i'm sure they figured that out, you tell them they better not put that rail- gun in out-
space and they don't like that x-47b either, i have seen that craft in this area three times they stopped right over my head one night about tree top level it always had 5 707 jets with it. at that time it was still flat
black it is now navy gray....
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Have seen enough that my mom wanted be to right a book, i told her i would, but no one would believe me, before i die, it will be your material

content.detailedDescription: Was more like a rocket, but in an area where we don't get rockets, central vermont. very long roaring rumble, doppler effect. sighted fireball above trees, up in mountain area. could have been very far away, just like a large rocket launch. wondering what it was and why here. i know there was a rocket launch in virginia yesterday. saw two fireballs, but seemed more like atmosphere blinded it for a second and then it was re-visble as it rose.
content.summary: Rocket or fighter jet maybe

content.detailedDescription: Arrived at exactly 1820 at my home with a friend (carpool) retired air force and army aviation personnel both with 38 eight years��� experience in aircraft. live in the country friend said john what is that and point up. clear night no noise at all no chickens dog or anything.  look up seen this big triangle shape moving slowly over my yard , me and my house. i have a big yard and it covered the whole thing. 2 acres. no sounds i could make out the out line as sort of triangle with maybe rounded front what i would call big wing. on small solid reddish light on the front , used the oak trees as a gauge for size and for distance. it was below clouds but maybe 250 ft above trees.  we watch it come over my house and as it reach the road it banked to the southeast as it move off what appeared to be a small chase plane appeared to the left side about a 1oo feet of it���s side.  at this point the back of the object hat a row of white lights that sort of pulsed but in a left to right and not in a pattern. . this means to tail fin as normal aircraft have.  it went about 8 to 10 miles and turn south. we both where unaware of any aircraft in our or other countries to match what we saw.
content.summary: Bigger than a c-5 aircraft, look like the big wing bommber but bigger

content.detailedDescription:
I was with two friends, and we were at an empty menards parking lot in my city, watching the meteor shower that was supposed to happen those few nights. we were parked facing directly east, sitting on the east side of the lot. there were no lights/objects obstructing my view at any time. we had noticed the sky was full of planes, and when we bothered to count the blinking lights, it was something like 20-30 flashing lights visible to us in east sky. after about 5 minutes in the lot, my female friend pointed out an orange-ish light to the north-east in the field beside the building. aprox 200 yds away. it was hovering directly off the ground below some power lines, beside a sub-station. after hovering for about 30 seconds, it began moving sw towards the menards building. it slowly rose above the building, and stopped moving, a few feet above the top of the building, no more than 75 yards away from my vehicle.

 me and my friends were in awe, and the next thing we knew, the objects glow grew in intensity at least tenfold, resembling the sun for roughly 5 seconds, before slowly dimming back to its original amber glow. the object sat there for 3-4 more minutes, and the amber glow spontaneously went out, and the object instantly began rising, moving towards us and up. the glow went away and was replaced by what could best be described as lights that mimic those of a traditional aircraft. 2 blinking lights on the edges of its silhouette (which i could never properly make out even when it flew over) the object flew directly over my sunroof (which i had open) aprox 75-100 yards above my vehicle. i'd say it was round if anything. the only thing that distinguished it from a plane in this form was a bottom central red light, that appeared to sparkle or pulse. this event has changed my life and the lives of my friends. more encounters have happened since, but this was the most profound single experience of my life. -[name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Was approached by a glowing amber orb at 11pm with two friends. glowing orb put on a spectacular show.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north on 17 in the hampstead nc vacinity, when i notice something that caught my attention,first i saw something of red ,i slowed my driving,traffic was almost absent,i continue looking at the direction of what i was seeing,as it was in the direction flow that i was,...Then of a sudden,i notice of rotation of reddish orange lights,with a wobbiling ascending up as i was looking at it,and then like it just vanished,that was the second sighting that i had encountered in my life.
content.summary: Ufo seen from treetop view

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 11/19/2013 at around 5:30 pm cst i went outside to my front porch to observe the sky to the s and sw of my house. the weather was cool, clear, and the stars were just starting to appear. my eye immediately focused on a very large bright object about 30 degrees above the horizon to the south of me. the object appeared to be a star at first but was extremely bright, it was brighter than any other star that was out. i might ad that i have seen this object for several nights in a row and it is always in the same location. i always appears just shortly after sundown and stays out for about 1 or 2 hours then goes out. after viewing the object for about 20 minutes with my eyes i went inside and got a pair of tasco 10x50 binoculars for a better look. when i viewed the object through the binoculars i was astonished! it appeared to be a huge triangle wing shaped object with 5 or 6 very intense white lights in the rear (engines?) and a very intense red strobe in the center on the bottom. it also had 3 very running lights. one in each corner. the surface appeared jet black like the stealth bomber. there was no noise at all. it was slowly rotating and appeared to flip on its nose and stand nose down. it emitted a bright white strobe that pulsated outward from the bottom. i noticed 2-3 other smaller bright objects at a lower altitude that appeared to be circling the main object. also i observed at least two conventional aircraft fly over the object at a higher elevation. they appeared to be cargo planes or very large private planes. i could not make out any features on the smaller bright white object, but they never  left the main object, they just circled it. i watched this go on from about 5:50 pm cst to 7:00pm cst and noticed that the main bright object was slowly descending in what appeared to be an arc-like flight path. it was moving slowly from 30 degrees azimuth to the due s (heading of 180 degrees on a compass) to  treetop level in the sw (about a 220 degree compass heading)
as it was descending it would dim and brighten, then the lights appeared to go out one by one until finally it disappeared from view. the smaller objects stayed with the main triangle until it went out. i don't know if it landed or not. i might add that fort leonard wood army base is in the general direction the object was last observed and it has an airfield.
content.summary: Large object in s sky, appeared to be star like but actually triangle shaped

content.detailedDescription:
This report is submitted by iowa mufon field investigator david kreiter
  in a phone interview, the witness stated that a silent, glowing, amber, cylindrical,object moved from a northeasterly direction to a southwesterly direction at an altitude of about 15 to 20 degree above the horizon.
  the witness was doing some gardening work at a house that borders the rock river, about five block from her residence, when she noticed the bright glowing amber light in the northeast. after watching the object for a couple of minutes she rang the doorbell of her client so that he could come outside to see the object for himself.  they both watched the object for several more minutes as it moved very slowly to the southwest. the object was visible for a total of about nine minutes until it went behind a tree line.  she stated that the object's apparent size was nearly as large as her hand at arm's length. the description of the object matched another object she saw on a television program on january 8th 2007. the witness stated that she has had two other sightings during her life-time./djk
content.summary: A silent, amber, glowing, cylindrical object moved silently overhead

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I cant believe the real world this is my name is al for short i have been a ufo hunter for 30 years never seen  one until november 18 2008 1200am that was amazing 3 large red  orbs . lived in lowell since 1978 came from azores saint migeul moved to this area back 11/18/2008 where all this amazing journey is taking place i had a close encounter of the 3rd kind in my room glowing what it appearead to be a reptile glowing energy lowell has been ufo hooooot spot still going till this day  i have late video of ufo all this is happing in front of my window many sightings over 6 years this info is on u tube lowell ufo  i need  help call me asap this should be taking very serius  i am a data bank for ufo  sightings there are others in lowell who also are witnesses to these amazing facts the gov- shoulb be asamed  to be lying to the plubic  they even sent this intense blue microwave light over my window that was amazing too see there are weird things going on in lowell please call me for info real info hidef camara  who ever reads this there are ufo waves for 6 years so much info over north common park lowell mass   i have 6 discs picture
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Lowell mass red hot zone blue not normal flight

content.detailedDescription: Last night i was looking from my front door i also seen a lot of helicopters but they were moving i'm not really sure what it was. i pull out my  bin i had that was 1000 yds. i was telling my wife this is strange but as i was looking at it was so bright it was in the l shape and i could see the stars in the back ground but this object was bigger than the stars, after a hour it seem to fade away i was going to use my camera but it was a 10x i never took a picture of it so i apology i have never saw something like this before, i wonder if anybody else seen what i saw last night.
content.summary: And it was so bright that it wasn't moving i thought i was seeing thing's i had a teleascope but i never set it up. strange, it was the moon .

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were visiting my wife parents over the bank holiday weekend. on saturday the 5th of may 2012 i was sat out in the garden at 103 nanegreive road watching the planes coming into land at the nearby manchester airport. when at approx 2015 hrs i saw a black triangle move from the east to the west with out making any noise then it hovered for a few seconds and then shot straight up very, very, fast only making a low woshing sound. this event only lasted 15 seconds. after the event the planes stopped flying on that flight path and then 5 mins later started using a different approach path.
when i first saw i thought at first it could be a militry plane but then i realized it was not of this world and even the stealthest plane makes a noise but there was no noise from this flying object. there was no lights on it and to shot of straight up like it did in a blink of an eye i dont know any aircraft that can do that with out making any noise.

my reaction was one of amazement that i saw it. i live on the edge of the cotswolds and we do occasionally do see strange lights and objects.
content.summary: Solid back triangle moving left to right then shot straight up making a fint woshing sound interfering with flight path to manchester airport

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside closing garage for the night, right before supper.
i hear a loud helicopter which flight path is almost right above us for traffic to seeley navel air base and yuma air base ,so low helicopters not a surprise. i look around sometimes its border patrol chopper around hovering in circles. from the west going east i see chopper lights and strobe then notice aircraft about fifty feet below chopper had no strobe and was a solid green color, as they passed just north of my house i saw the lower craft was not a chopper it was oval shaped about third size of chopper and was a soft green color. then object stopped dead in its track in an instant,as quick as it stopped it headed north and upward until i could barely see it i notice it looked like it was descending downward it seemed to be a slow descent but could not keep eyesight on object was to small and far away. feeling were of overwhelmed at the speed of craft and how it could stop dead turn 90 degrees in an instant.
content.summary: Oval shaped light green glowing object about thirty feet long

content.detailedDescription: On the above date i was at the motor city casino visiting a friend on the fifth floor of the hotel and began taking pictures on the south side of the hotel and one year later i was looking at the pictures and noticed that there was a light in the sky and could not explain what the light was.
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription: I was at my telescope checking out the moons craters. stoped to give my eyes a rest" i rubbed my eyes and looked to the southwest and saw three lights . as it got closer i could see it was one of those triangle people talk about . i ran inside to get my camera but was afraid i'd miss it so grabed my wifes wich was closer and ran back outside. it was on the same corse so i fumbled with the camera to set it and when i looked back up the thing was changing """ the white lights on the three ends started changeing from white to red to blue and it started over faster and faster till the whole craft lit up""""" .Well i aimed the camera and brased myself on the porch and snaped one picture . i looked at the photo and back up " and in a shot in left to the east. i've never seen anything that fast . i've spent a lot of time at the telescope and seen a lot " some with no explenation but never seen anything that close.I felt like it wanted to be seen why else would it be that bright at night??? i'll send the picture with this report . the photo is great just as i saw it.
content.summary: Craft with three lights then craft lit up completely and was gone real fast speed unreal

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching stephen corbert it had been on about 10 mins, when my daughter next door texted me to say they were watching two ufo's flashing colors in the east sky above my house...So i ran outside followed by my son...My daughter, her daughter and a friend were already outside coming towards my house yelling about the lights in the sky...
my son and i ran up the driveway to where the others were and looked to the east....There they were...The one closest to the north was smaller, farther away but was flashing colors and the one more to the south was bigger and i could really see the colors....Red, orange, blue and green....Both objects were flashing ...My daughter thought they may be signaling one another...
i ran inside to get more jackets because three of us ran out without one...
when i came back out the objects were still there flashing..But getting smaller aka farther away...We were so excited, we watched for about 10 or more minutes and then the cold drove us inside....Both objects were still visible when we went in....
i came directly to computer to tell the sighting...:)
content.summary: Seen in eastern sky ...Two objects ...Flashing different colors..The object farest  north went  south and left a trail...

content.detailedDescription: Since an incident in june, i have been noticing objects in the sky.  we live next to the gulf of mexico. we also live in the very dark countryside. we have been noticing these pulsating lights that move for a while.  last week i was a few miles from home sitting in the car and i saw a cigar shaped object fly directly over me.  it was flashing white like a strobe light and had red on it; no green. i noticed it flew to a spot that seem close to where we always see these lights from our front porch. tonight i saw these same lights that seem to be rotating and projecting white red and green but hovering in one spot.  three of these took off like a slow airplane- again flashing white with red lights no green.  two flew right over me and seemto be triangular.  i was not able to video tape the flying objects, but i did video tape the orb like objects when the moon was coming up. you can see something fly right above the treeline headed north in front of the moon. you can also see the pulsating lights ascending.  there is always a lot of activity almost every night outside my house. it is pretty cool.  i have the video but my computer is broken.  i can't upload it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: My husband and i akways see these pulsating lights in the dark country sky where we live.  they move up, down, left,& right.  25% of these sightings change from hovering and pulsating to flying in a path with flasing white lights and a red light on it.

content.detailedDescription: I work fifteen minutes west of the city of kingston ont, the area i work is a low populated sparse buildings and mostly wooded area...While heading home from work approximately 18:20, ten minutes from the west end of the city traveling due east i saw a very, very, very bright area on the ground. there was significant bright white glow towards, around in all directions and into the sky. it surprised me with the amount of light that was emitted from this area, which was approximately one km (3000 ft) north of the highway i was on, beyond a partially cleared field but just into the woods beyond. i slowed and was taken aback, even shocked, by the brightness. i saw no detail other than the significant amount of light, as whatever was making the glow was hidden in the trees (although light did emit from between the trees as i slowly traveled by. i have traveled this road for years, know the area reasonably well, but never seen anything like that along this stretch of country road. i came home ready to share my strange story when my girlfriend was excited to tell me that while leaving work at 17:25 (approx 55 minutes earlier than my sighting) she had seen something really weird... she left her work (inside the city of kingston west end) and as she traveled west towards our home (along princess st- at gardiners rd) she witnessed a large, glowing object. she described it as being like a vertical pole, or rocket shape, glowing red as if on fire. the object was hovering a few hundred feet above the ground and slowly moving west, and as she continue to observe the object, it slowly rose in a directly up direction until it went out of her sight. upon reaching home she could make it out at a higher altitude heading west and up like a rocket, as she described it. the object was large. she was excited to tell me her story, but then was surprised when i then told her of my drive home. neither of us have ever seen anything of this nature before, and it was very strange that on the same date, same time of day (later and dark) we both 45 minutes apart from opposite ends then see something neither of us can explain. we do live a few km from the city airport, a smaller local airstrip with limited number of flights, but having grown up on a military base i know what we witnessed was not any standard aircraft of any known type. im a skeptic of ufos in general, until now that is, however am open to options or explanations of what we may have seen. i really regret that we both had cell phones with cameras, and neither of us thought in the moment to take a picture....I guess we were both a little to excited on what we were seeing.
content.summary: Two separate sightings within 45 minutes by two separate witnesses from two ends of the city

content.detailedDescription: When i was going from the upstairs of my home to downstairs, i happened to glance out of the front door window and noticed two very bright objects that appeared to move by the window quickly. i walked outside to get a better look thinking that they were possibly helicopters, or just something interesting to look at with my binoculars or telescope. however when i stood still outside i noticed the two objects appeared to not be moving, so i thought maybe they were just bright stars and i had observed some kind of optical illusion while moving by the window. however, before going back inside i noticed that the two objects started to slowly move again, very slowly up and to the right exactly in unison. at this time i noticed that one object was predominantly white with blue, red and greenish lightly pulsating all at the same time, while the other was mostly gold and copper flickering, with sometimes a yellow tinge. at certain times it appeared there was a very faint third object off the left of the bright white/blue object but i could not get a good enough look as it was too dim and close to the light pollution and tree line. i instantly got excited and ran inside to the house, grabbed my canon powershot elph 510hs and quickly set it to night shot. there was also no sound of any kind; it's very quiet in my area and i can hear helicopters or jets from a great distance away before you can even see them, which made the experience very intriguing. it was very difficult to get the camera onto the objects as they kept moving and there is no optical viewfinder on the camera, only the small digital screen. i then proceeded to take 3 separate videos, one with night shot mode, one with night scene mode and the final with long shutter (night) setting. i rested the camera on the side of the house to try to stabilize it as best as i could, but the objects were moving quite a lot and it was difficult to capture. feeling that i took as much clear video as i possibly could (about 10 minutes worth), i decided to get my telescope out just to absolutely make sure it's not some strange helicopters i'm witnessing. i was luckily able to get the telescope zoomed in perfectly on the white/blue object and it was clearly a bright white sphere with pulsating colors and it appeared to actually jump from part of the lens to the other. while trying to get the telescope on a good angle, a group of 2-3 helicopters flew overhead in the direction of the object and about 5 minutes after that 2 jets flew in the same direction, both with 2 visible exhausts close together; which reminded me of the rear of an f-15 or similar fighter jet. i tried to get my camera back out to record it but by the time the camera was ready they were behind the trees and you could only hear the engines. hanscom air force base is only about 15-20 miles from where i live and i know they have fighter aircraft, although i am unsure what their current status is as of 2010. however, i do know they are still an active military base. i went back inside to get my father who also saw exactly what i was seeing. i then went to get my brother, but when i came back outside, all of the objects were gone. upon reviewing the videos i took, there was one clip that seemed to show what i was seeing the best (long shutter mode), and it actually quite clearly shows the white/blue and gold/copper object instantly jump slightly to the right, in exact unison. and it is not my poor camera management as when this happened i had the camera resting against the side of the house and when i move the camera about later in the video you can see the colors streaking from the long shutter exposure time. on the other video it shows the objects moving to the left, stopping and moving to the right, and at the end of the clip you can actually hear the jets approaching. i have seen many strange objects like this in my area over the past 2 years but this is the first time i have somewhat good quality footage of the event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two pulsating orbs, one white/blue/red/yellow other gold/copper

content.detailedDescription: The last couple of nights my friend who has been staying with me has been telling me he has been seeing a ufo like object. i dismissed it as a star, but it has been dissapearing in between his smoke breaks he takes outside. so. went outside t see it, and it was in the western part of the sky, under the clouds, just sitting there. we waited and it just disappeared after about 30 mins. could not believe it. planes do not hover and stars do not dissapear. it was about 4 times the size of a star and very bright white. just round. hovered perfectly. we saw planes after that in the opposite direction after it was gone and it was definitely not a plane!  we will keep our eyes open cause it has been coming back!
content.summary: Bright glowing orb. about 4 times bigger and brighter than a star.

content.detailedDescription: While driving home, noticed a strange flashing object in the clear, dark sky in front of me. this was as bright as a camera flash, extremely bright. it was flickering and seemed to bounce up and down, definitely not a normal flight path of anything i have ever seen. it seemed to be very small in size. after observing i thought it might have been a rocket, but it was going horizontal not vertical, also the light was not yellow or orange in color, as you would think any rocket would emit. this was white. i am convinced this is a genuine ufo, i have never witnessed anything like this before today. if anyone else knows anything about this, please post it.
content.summary: Unknown object in sky. 11/19/13

content.detailedDescription: I was working at a tv commercial film shoot at dawn animal agency in westtown. we were last to wrap the location to head back to the holiday in in middletown, about a 20 min drive. there was the truck of electricians who had left 5 minutes ahead of us. we were a van of other various film crew departments. there were about 10 of us in the van. it was still light out but the sun was getting lower. as we drive on cty rd. 12 as we looked out the van window at about 11 o'clock in the sky, there was a pinky orange object that a few of us said at the same time, "what is that?" as we drove it was getting closer. at first we could not really make out what it was, but we all agreed it was not a plane or anything else we had ever seen. it slowly got bigger and bigger, and it was getting darker and darker as the sun was setting. we kept looking at it as it was really getting bigger and bigger and we were all freaking out, but at some point the road turns and there was a lot of tree cover so we could not see it. then at a small turn in the road, there stopped in the middle of the road were the electricians, their truck stopped in the middle of the road and they were out of their truck standing in the middle of the road looking up. we stopped and got out and there above us was this unbelievable enormous ship hovering quietly right at the tree line. the circumference was different colored lights that changed color, but not in a pattern, they just changed colors, pinky orangey bluey, yellowy. we huddled together gazing up for about 5 minutes. and the in a second it pulled away, without a sound and incredibly fast. the electricians told us their truck had stopped. when it was gone, the truck started again. we got to the hotel, told everyone else on the crew - they just thought we were nuts. but it was in the paper the next morning as a crowd in the parking lot of the local supermarket had also seen it. i still talk occasionally a few of my fellow witnesses and we are still freaked out, because it was so completely unmistakably huge, so close and so real. i have told other people in my life and i am afraid it really has had deleterious effect on my credibility. so i just don't tell people anymore, but it has left a huge mark on my life and on how i see our place in the universe, i think in a very good way. it really forces you into a bigger perspective!
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Observed for over 15 minutes, a dark metal, larger than an aircraft carrier, right at tree height, baseball diamond shaped with lights on the entire circumference.

content.detailedDescription: Was on back deck of building, saw an object at first thought it might be a plane, but not moving, then thought it might be a star, but too close and below clouds.  watched it for 20 minutes and got binoculars, 2 pair, and got neighbor to see what she thought.  we both watched it for over an hour and it is still in the sky as i report.  it is stationary with a little movement to the west.  many we are in flight path for o'hare airport and many planes and helecopters have passed under the object.  when sighting it through binoculars (wish we had a telescope) the object is round and very bright with lights all around the perimeter, from time to time it turns and appears oblong.  as i mentioned it is still there.
content.summary: Watched object with binoculars, neighbor also.  would occassionally turn on its side but stayed in positiion and is still there.
